p: The following plants are also used as antimalarials in Mozambique: Aloe parvibracteata Sch√∂nland, Cassia abbreviata Oliv., Cassia occidentalis L., Crossopteryx febrifuga (Afzel. ex G.Don) Benth., Leonotis leonurus (L.) R.Br., Parkinsonia aculeata L., Pittosporum tobira (Thunb.) W.T.Aiton, Plumbago auriculata Lam., Senna didymobotrya (Fresen.) H.S.Irwin & Barneby, Schefflera actinophylla (Endl.) Harms, Trichilia emetica Vahl. and Tabernaemontana elegans Strapt [ 23].
